meanings.sent1: I accidentally fankled the wires while trying to set up the TV.
meanings.sent2: The yarn fankled around the knitting needles as I worked on my scarf.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the mess, I only managed to fankle it even more!
meanings.sent4: Her words fankled my thoughts, making it hard to focus on anything else.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the tree fankled together, creating a natural obstacle course.

meanings.sent1: The fisherman pulled up a fankle of seaweed along with his net.
meanings.sent2: The old attic was full of forgotten treasures hidden in a fankle of boxes and cobwebs.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail disappeared into the fankle of yarn, causing a playful commotion.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the city lights formed a fankle of twinkling stars against the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The hiker struggled to navigate through the fankle of fallen branches in the forest.
